overview: Seong Tae, works as series editor for a web comics company. He himself is a great fan of The Martial Arts War, a serial under his care. His series is at risk to be aborted, because its creator Byeong Geon, is not sending out manuscript lately anymore. Then one day Seong Tae recognises Byeong Geon’s drawing from the hand-out of a pseudo-religious group claimed ‘Legions of Sun Wukong’. He is assured the creator is detained by them. Seong Tae decides to infiltrate, hoping to find Byeong Geon and save The Martial Arts War.
title: The Martial Arts War
